import "./Project.scss"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import Pic from "../images/demo.png"; function Project(prop) { return (

Coffee Hours

Awarded Best Pitch in TechNova 2021 and prototyped in 36 hours, Coffee Hours is a youth-friendly website used for facilitating virtual coffee chats with current students, faculty members and alumni from universities across Canada. Includes an authentication system with error messages for incorrect credentials using Firebase Auth REST API and data storage for user comments by integrating Cloud Firestore.

Firebase React SCSS
); } export default Project;
